response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. I understand its worth to you stands at $1,200,000, and we are excited to offer it to you with a special deal. Our proposal is to sell this remarkable product to you for $1,150,000. This price not only reflects the product's quality but also offers you an opportunity to secure it at a favorable rate. We believe this offer presents an excellent chance for both parties to benefit. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1150000}
